document.full_text: wang jianhua, who left china to better support his family, was among the 15 passengers who died in a bus crash returning to manhattan from a connecticut casino.
document.title: bus crash in the bronx ends a man's fight for his family
lines_and_colors: wang jianhua, who left china to better support his family, was among the 15 passengers who died in a bus crash returning to manhattan from a connecticut casino.
